Text:
BTW, this tries to install crap silverlight (from microsoft).

Click with secondary mouse button to SHOW PACKAGE CONTENTS and install only the quicktime plugin.
If you already have the previous version of Flip4Mac, you can get FREE updates by running Flip4Mac software update from your System Preferences.

Many thanks, EyeTV works again. Was black screened after a Snow Leopard update, I spent a whole day trying to sort it then gave up short of paying for new software.
I purchased EyeTV 410 just before EyeTV2 and begrudge any additional costs.
Sorry wrong page, Thanks for this though aswell ;)
Actually, I had Flip4mac studio pro HD working with QT7 previously, this has ruined everything and I cant find a way to go back.
tries to get you to subscribe to some cellphone sub service to get a password to unlock the RAR file..its cheaper to buy the product than to get the password :)
